description: This table contains information about changes to the Chronicles record status/soft-delete flag (SDFL item) of the authorization request record. Only records that have had their record status changed will be included in this table.

columns.name: AUTH_REQUEST_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the authorization request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SDFL_EDIT_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time that the record status of the authorization request record was changed.

columns.name: SDFL_EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the user who changed the authorization request record status.

columns.name: SDFL_EDIT_ACTI_C_NAME
columns.description:
The edit action category ID for the change of the authorization request record status.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Delete


Undo Delete


Hide


Unhide
